title: When the sweeney water line broke we were all ask to reduce water use even though those of us in the Odgen area are fed from the Odgen Nano plant. Now that there is work to do at the Odgen plant on Thursday of this week, only Odgen area residence are being ask to reduce water use Thursday. Why isn\'t the entire county being ask to conserve. Just like before. Seems like a double standard to me.
text:
